stimulusHtml: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.

features.html:
Compare how legislative powers can be independent or constrained by other governmental institutions in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries. In your response, you should do the following.

  1. Define legislative independence.
  2. Describe how legislative independence is used by governmental institutions in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.
  3. Explain why each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in (b) would choose to constrain legislative powers.
